name: Summer
description: Keep the fun going all summer long! SCORES will offer both school-based programs and stand-alone summer camps. For school-based summer programs, please check with your child’s school for details. SCORES SELECTA Summer Camp offers a fun, empowering space for female-identifying students! At SELECTA Summer Camp, campers are coached and mentored by an all-female coaching staff. Campers will: - Learn soccer skills - Get active through fitness and fun - Explore healthy habits and nutrition - Discover
